scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix enter.pollinations.ai && npm install --prefix text.pollinations.ai && npm install --prefix image.pollinations.ai && npm install --prefix packages/sdk && npm install --prefix packages/mcp
scripts.install:services: npm install --prefix enter.pollinations.ai && npm install --prefix text.pollinations.ai && npm install --prefix image.pollinations.ai
scripts.install:packages: npm install --prefix packages/sdk && npm install --prefix packages/mcp
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --prefix '[{name}]' --names 'enter,text,image' -c 'auto' 'npm run dev --prefix enter.pollinations.ai' 'npm run dev --prefix text.pollinations.ai' 'npm run dev --prefix image.pollinations.ai'
scripts.format:changed: git diff --diff-filter=d --name-only origin/main | grep -E '\.(js|ts|jsx|tsx|json|jsonc)$' | grep -v -E '(node_modules|reddit|dist|build|\.next|\.cache|out)/' | xargs npx biome check --write
